name: test_e2e_with_logs[712_EMRG_MONGO_008]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `EMRG_MONGO_008` |
| **Name** | MongoDB $exists operator bypass |
| **Category** | OTHER |
| **Subcategory** | mongodb_injection |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `{"$exists": true}`
- **Encoded**: `%7B%22%24exists%22%3A%20true%7D`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~94000ms
- **Timestamp**: 11:10:25.000 UTC

## Rule Mapping

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Expected Rule** | `[NGINX Emerging Threat] MongoDB NoSQL injection` |
| **Matched Rule** | `[NGINX Emerging Threat] MongoDB NoSQL injection test_id=EMRG_MONGO_008-1772277025924-kmydzs pattern_id=EMRG_MONGO_008 uri=/?q=%7B%22%24exists%22%3A%20true%7D client=127.0.0.1` |
| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |

## Detection Evidence

**Rule Name**: [NGINX Emerging Threat] MongoDB NoSQL injection test_id=EMRG_MONGO_008-1772277025924-kmydzs pattern_id=EMRG_MONGO_008 uri=/?q=%7B%22%24exists%22%3A%20true%7D client=127.0.0.1

**Falco Log Entry**:
